TEXT.TITLE: INLAND <IAD> PLANS TO PROCEED WITH PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Inland Steel Co said it and the USS Division of USX Corp <X> are continuing to pursue plans for construction of a state-of-the-art line for continuous prepainting of steel coils. It said the proposed line will primarily serve the appliance market. It said a location for the new plant has yet to be selected. Reuter
